tamil.description: Offensive language identification in dravidian lanaguages dataset. The goal of this task is to identify offensive language content of the code-mixed dataset of comments/posts in Dravidian Languages ( (Tamil-English, Malayalam-English, and Kannada-English)) collected from social media.
tamil.citation:
@inproceedings{dravidianoffensive-eacl,
title={Findings of the Shared Task on {O}ffensive {L}anguage {I}dentification in {T}amil, {M}alayalam, and {K}annada},
author={Chakravarthi, Bharathi Raja and
Priyadharshini, Ruba and
Jose, Navya and
M, Anand Kumar and
Mandl, Thomas and
Kumaresan, Prasanna Kumar and
Ponnsamy, Rahul and
V,Hariharan and
Sherly, Elizabeth and
McCrae, John Philip },
booktitle = "Proceedings of the First Workshop on Speech and Language Technologies for Dravidian Languages",
month = April,
year = "2021",
publisher = "Association for Computational Linguistics",
year={2021}
}
